stimulusHtml: All switches are open, and there is no stored energy in the capacitor or the inductor. Switch S3 is closed. What is the current in the inductor after steady state has been reached?

features.html:
'

A circuit is constructed using a battery of emf ε, a resistor of resistance R, a capacitor of capacitance C, an inductor of inductance L, and three switches, as shown in the figure above. The three switches are labeled S1 , S2 , and S3 , and they can be operated independently.
